core

Class GameLoop

  • java.lang.Object
    • core.GameLoop

  • public class GameLoop
extends java.lang.Object
    The engine's main game loop.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private static int frameCount
      The number of elapsed frames.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor and Description
      private GameLoop()
      To can't create GameLoop instance.

    • Field Detail

      • frameCount

        private static int frameCount
        The number of elapsed frames.

    • Constructor Detail

      • GameLoop

        private GameLoop()
        To can't create GameLoop instance.

    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        public static void initialize(WindowParameters parameters)
        Initializes the engine including the windowing system, the input handling, the rendering pipeline and much more. You should call it before any OpenGL related code and before the GameLoop's run method.
        Parameters:
        parameters - parameters for the window

      • initialize

        public static void initialize()
        Initializes the engine including the windowing system, the input handling, the rendering pipeline and much more. You should call it before any OpenGL related code and before the GameLoop's run method.

      • run

        public static void run()
        The engine's game loop. It updates all Components of the GameObjects, updates the resources ,renders the scene, handles the input and swaps the buffers in every frame.

      • getFrameCount

        public static int getFrameCount()
        Returns the number of elapsed frames.
        Returns:
        the number of elapsed frames
